news.title: Money sent abroad illegally in 2007 equals cost of linking India's rivers
news.summary: About Rs 5.3 lakh crore (at the current exchange rate of Rs 64/US dollar) flowed out of India illegaly in 2007, a government-commissioned report on black money has revealed.

news.title: Flow of black money abroad ranged from less than 1% to 7% of India’s GDP between 2000-2010
